description:
The tangy flavours of an exotic fruit salad, without the weight, squishability, and requirement for refrigeration. Plus, the Superfruit delivers all the real food goodness Probar has made their name on.

  • Certified organic, non-GMOingredients
  • 100% vegan
  • Ingredients: brown rice syrup, oats, dates, sunflower seeds, cashew butter (cashews, sunflower oil), cashews, raisins, flax seeds, sesame seeds. almonds, crisp brown rice, dried cane syrup, strawberry puree, expeller pressed canola oil, vegetable glycerin, strawberries dried pineapple, dried cane syrup, dried papaya, apple juice concentrate, oat pumpkin seeds, molasses, acai powder, purple com extract, mangosteen powder, citric acid, Arabic gum, strawberry flavouring, salt, sunflower oil, natural flavour, camu camu powder, natural tocopherols and ascorbic acid (added to present flavour), rosemary extract
  • Allergens, contains: almonds, cashews, oats and sesame
  • May contain pit pieces, nutshells and other organic matter
  • Processed on equipment that processes peanuts, soy, wheat, and tree nuts
name: Probar Superfruit Slam Bar (Meal)
